item.title: 10 Uncommon Things to Consider for New Construction Homes
item.description: There are many decisions to make when building a new construction home, before and after you move in.

item.title: Restoration Hardware-inspired custom bed for less
item.description: I was obsessed with the clean lines and extra tall headboard of Restoration Hardware’s Lawson bed for the owner’s suite in our newly built home.
